name: NightFocus
0:
”Alexa open Night Focus”
”Alexa ask Night Focus to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: night focus
des:
Enhance your concentration and productivity with ambient sounds designed to help you focus at night. Whether you're studying, working late, or simply need to tune out distractions, these sounds will create the perfect nocturnal workspace.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Night Focus
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
